Name: Timer
Desc: This section lets you configure how the timer application works.

Keys.Name: Enable Figlet for timer
Keys.Description: If enabled, will use figlet for timer. Please note that it needs a big console screen in order to render the time properly with Figlet enabled.

Keys.Name: Figlet font for timer
Keys.Description: Write a figlet font that is supported by the Figgle library. Consult the library documentation for more information

Name: Pomodoro Timer
Desc: This section lets you configure how the pomodoro timer application works.

Keys.Name: Enable Figlet for the pomodoro timer
Keys.Description: If enabled, will use figlet for the pomodoro timer. Please note that it needs a big console screen in order to render the time properly with Figlet enabled.

Keys.Name: Figlet font for the pomodoro timer
Keys.Description: Write a figlet font that is supported by the Figgle library. Consult the library documentation for more information
